Text: 2003 LSU Tigers football team:  The Tigers compiled an 11–1 regular season record and then defeated the No. 5 Georgia Bulldogs in the SEC Championship Game, Afterward, LSU was invited to play the Oklahoma Sooners in the Sugar Bowl for the Bowl Championship Series (BCS) national title.

Text: 2003 LSU Tigers football team:  LSU won the BCS National Championship Game, the first national football championship for LSU since 1958.
